game.name: Starman in space
game.shortDescription: Driver will be on his red car as long as possible to remain unharmed. He'll need to Dodge asteroids to survive!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Driver will be on his red car as long as possible to remain unharmed. He'll need to Dodge asteroids to survive!

reviewHighlights.text: its a car in space dodging rocks, complete 18 levels of the levels just become longer and more tedious, I got the game for free but I regret adding it...
